abilities.name: Legendary Resistance
abilities.description: If the leviathan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

abilities.name: Partial Freeze.
abilities.description: If the leviathan takes 50 cold damage or more during a single turn, the leviathan partially freezes; until the end of its next turn, its speeds are reduced to 20 feet, and it makes attack rolls with disadvantage.

abilities.name: Siege Monster.
abilities.description: The leviathan deals double damage to objects and structures (included in Tidal Wave).

abilities.name: Water Form.
abilities.description: The leviathan can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
